rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Foyer
rooms.description: Modern open space with floor-to-ceiling windows to welcome natural light and maintain a contemporary look. Designed following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample seating and floor-to-ceiling windows providing an expansive view. Includes modern entertainment system and flexible furniture layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen, integrating design and functionality for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, fully equipped kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, designed with workflow in mind. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room featuring modern amenities, a private ensuite bathroom, and integrated storage solutions. Adheres to Vastu principles for guest privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an attached bathroom, walk-in closet, and floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring privacy and natural light. Designed following modern aesthetics and Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated living space for domestic helpers, with a compact kitchenette, bedroom, and bathroom. Designed for functionality and privacy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Modern door design with ample space for wheelchair accessibility, featuring a glass transom above to allow natural light.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Separate entrance for staff and service areas ensuring privacy and adherence to local building norms.

openings.name: Balcony/Veranda
openings.description: Overhanging structure providing outdoor space, designed with safety rails and aesthetic appeal. Incorporates Vastu recommendations for energy flow.
